title: yoshimitsu777
author: yoshimitsu777
content: can u please propose a solo mining pool for ravencoin (RVN) that is trustworthy, with low fee (max. 1.5%) and which pay outs all transaction fees of the mined block, too?

comments.author: Maidak
comments.body: Quote from: yoshimitsu777 on July 15, 2023, 06:15:24 AMcan u please propose a solo mining pool for ravencoin (RVN) that is trustworthy, with low fee (max. 1.5%) and which pay outs all transaction fees of the mined block, too?I'll gladly build you a solo pool for solo mining if your wanting to give me a 1.5% fee on anything you solomine
